sentences.sContent: Their engagement was announced in the paper.
sentences.sCn: 他们订婚的消息在报上公布了。

sentences.sContent: This is his only public speaking engagement on the tour.
sentences.sCn: 这是他此行唯一一场公开演讲。

sentences.sContent: ...Those of us who are not scientists should also be prepared to support public engagement by scientists...

exam.question: The ______ on this apartment expires in a year’s time.

answer.explain: 句意： 这套房子的租期为一年。treaty： 条约； engagement： 约会； subsidy： 补助金， 津贴。

words.tran: 保证；约定；同…订婚（engage的过去分词）
从事；答应，保证；交战；啮合
吸引，占用；使参加；雇佣；使订婚；预定

trans.tranOther: an agreement between two people to marry, or the period of time they are engaged
